series.title: Breaking Bad
series.description: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.

series.title: Game of Thrones
series.description: Nine noble families fight for control over the mythical lands of Westeros; A forgotten race returns after being dormant for thousands of years.

series.title: The Sopranos
series.description: New Jersey mob boss, Tony Soprano, deals with personal and professional issues in his home and business life, which affects his mental state and ends up seeking professional psychiatric counseling.

series.title: The Wire
series.description: Baltimore drug scene, seen through the eyes of drug dealers and law enforcement.

series.title: Band of Brothers
series.description: The story of Easy Company of the US Army 101st Airborne division and their mission in WWII Europe from Operation Overlord through V-J Day.

series.title: Orange Is the New Black
series.description: The story of Piper Chapman, a woman in her thirties who is sentenced to fifteen months in prison after being convicted of a decade-old crime of transporting money to her drug-dealing girlfriend.

series.title: Vikings
series.description: The world of the Vikings is brought to life through the journey of Ragnar Lothbrok, the first Viking to emerge from Norse legend and onto the pages of history - a man on the edge of myth.
